skills.name: CLI Architecture
skills.pattern: Commands, subcommands, options, flags, arguments, config files

skills.name: Exit Codes
skills.pattern: 0 = success, 1 = general error, 2 = misuse, 126 = permission, 127 = not found

skills.name: Stdin/Stdout/Stderr
skills.pattern: process.stdin for input, stdout for output, stderr for errors

skills.name: Pipes
skills.pattern: cat file | grep pattern | sort | uniq - composable tools

skills.name: Argument Parsing
skills.pattern: yargs, commander, meow - options, positionals, validation

skills.name: Option Conventions
skills.pattern: -v/--version, -h/--help, -q/--quiet, -f/--force, --no-color

skills.name: Subcommands
skills.pattern: git commit, docker compose up - hierarchical structure

skills.name: Environment Variables
skills.pattern: process.env.API_KEY, dotenv, precedence: arg > env > config

skills.name: Progress Indicators
skills.pattern: ora spinners, cli-progress bars, percentage updates

skills.name: Colors
skills.pattern: chalk, picocolors - green for success, red for error, yellow for warning

skills.name: Interactive Prompts
skills.pattern: inquirer, prompts - select, confirm, input, password

skills.name: Tables
skills.pattern: cli-table3, table - formatted data display

skills.name: Help Text
skills.pattern: Auto-generated help, examples, man pages

skills.name: Error Messages
skills.pattern: What went wrong, why, how to fix - not just stack traces

skills.name: npm bin
skills.pattern: package.json bin field, #!/usr/bin/env node shebang

skills.name: Single Executable
skills.pattern: pkg, nexe, vercel/pkg - bundle Node.js into executable

skills.name: Cross-platform
skills.pattern: path.sep, os.homedir(), cross-spawn, handle Windows/Unix differences

skills.name: Config Files
skills.pattern: cosmiconfig - .toolrc, .toolrc.json, tool.config.js

skills.name: Config Locations
skills.pattern: ~/.config/tool/, ~/.toolrc, project .toolrc

skills.name: Config Precedence
skills.pattern: CLI args > env vars > project config > user config > defaults

skills.name: Shell Completion
skills.pattern: omelette, tabtab - bash/zsh/fish completions

skills.name: Update Notifications
skills.pattern: update-notifier - inform users of new versions

skills.name: Plugin System
skills.pattern: Dynamic loading, hooks, plugin discovery

skills.name: REPL Mode
skills.pattern: readline, repl module - persistent interactive session

skills.name: CLI Testing
skills.pattern: execa for spawning, snapshot output, mock stdin

skills.name: Integration Testing
skills.pattern: Run actual CLI, verify output, check file system changes

skills.name: Idempotent Operations
skills.pattern: Check before write, skip if exists, --force to override

skills.name: Dry Run Mode
skills.pattern: --dry-run flag, show what would happen without doing it

skills.name: Verbose/Quiet Modes
skills.pattern: -v for verbose, -q for quiet, multiple -v for debug

skills.name: Machine-readable Output
skills.pattern: --json flag, --format=json|yaml|table for scripting
